title: [Large-Scale] Mobile App-Based Fidelity Improvement Program for Autism Intervention Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of Naturalistic Developmental Behavioral Interventions (NDBI) theory and practical experience in autism intervention
context.additional_context: An in-company professional development program conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment. Participants include practicing special education teachers or related professionals.

learning_goals: Fidelity of NDBI intervention techniques can be achieved at 80% or higher through mobile app-based training
Intervention strategies in naturalistic settings can be successfully implemented in three or more real-world cases
The intervention implementation process can be analyzed and reported with over 80% accuracy through peer feedback and self-assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
